Thanks for buying my asset pack and supporting my art!

I'm glad you're using my textures in your project! Feel free to check out some models and assets I have on:
https://diopieretti.itch.io

These textures can be used for commercial projects as long as you give me credit! 

These textures CAN'T be modified for resale, and I do NOT authorize any use of this texture with AI.

Want a custom model? You can contact me on Fiverr!
https://www.fiverr.com/diopieretti3d

-------------------------------------------------------------------


There are a total of 438 Textures including variants

12 Roofs
137 Floors
288 Walls
1 Plants

if you liked please consider leaving a comment on itch's page.

Any problem or suggestion you can contact me on https://diopieretti.itch.io or diopieretti.contato@gmail.com (e-mail only for support)

This pack may be updated sometime

Thank you.
